sections.description:
FAQ plugin that gives you a chance to make, sort out and expose your FAQs (frequently asked questions) in a matter of seconds through your WordPress administrator board. Select from FAQ designs and styles.

FAQ KEY FEATURES

  • Mos FAQs, with unlimited tag and category support
  • Create FAQ categories and tags
  • Create FAQ posts and assign categories and tags to them
  • Easy design layout to style your FAQ posts
  • For advanced user additional CSS and JS input panel for adding custom scripts
  • And the most important thing it will not add any additional time on your page load time

SHORTCODE

[mos_faq]

Simply insert the above shortcode into any page to display your FAQs.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  • Upload the 'mos-elements' folder to the `/wp-content/plugins/` directory or install via the WP admin panel
  • Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' menu in WordPress
  • That's it.

sections.faq:
What does this do?

It uses the custom post type feature to create a dedicated FAQ section in your WordPress site, including categories and tags exclusive to them.

How Do I Use It?

Each FAQ acts like a post. You can assign your own categories or tags and organize as you see fit. Try adding the shortcode [mos_faq] to whatever page youâ€™d like to display the FAQ on.

What attributes does the [mos_faq] shortcode accept?

The FAQ shortcode accepts a lot of attributes,

  • limit: Define the number of FAQ to show. Default value of attribute is '-1'. This attribute accept any numerical value.
  • offset: Define the number of FAQ to displace or pass over. Default value of attribute is '0'.
  • category: Define the categories of FAQ to show. Default value of attribute is '-1'. It take a comma-separated list of FAQ category ids.
    For example, Audio (which has a id 123) to include only FAQs about the Category Book (which has a id 123), you would use:
    [mos_faq category='123']
